website_summaries.verdict: This durable, water-resistant cover works best with upright car seats rather than seats for infants.
cons: Doesn't fit Evenflo Symphony LX very well

customer_reviews.title: Bag was not overloaded - it fit my car seat and base easily. I realize luggage gets beat up
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problem as some others who wrote a negative review. Upon collecting my bag after its very first use, the zipper seam was ripped away from the top of the bag. Bag was not overloaded - it fit my car seat and base easily. I realize luggage gets beat up, but I expected the bag to last for more than one flight. Update - Within 24 hours of posting my review, I was contacted by the vendor and was given the choice of a full refund or a new product. Thank you to J&B Trading for excellent and timely customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Thoreen

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. We bought it to use on our trip to New Zealand recently. I didn't want to use my son's super heavy car seat, so I actually bought a lightweight Cosco Scenera seat from Walmart and it fit perfectly in this bag. We ended up checking this and a stroller with our luggage (free to check both) since we were already carrying a lot of items through the airport. The bag shows no signs of wear and tear. It held up great on 2 international flights and 3 regional ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole11

customer_reviews.title: Great for Infant Car Seat *without* Base
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this on 5 flights and it's still in great condition. However, it doesn't work well with the Britax B-Safe infant carrier *and* the base - the weight of the entire base and seat together distribute across a thin vertical line on the lower back (see pictures). It's painful and dangerous to carry weight like this. Works well without the base, also works well with the Evenflow Tribute.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Nice but should be more specific about sizing
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a pretty color and seems pretty sturdy. I would definitely have appreciated more of a size guide other than it fits most major brands though. I have the graaco expand to fit and it barely fits in there. It was a struggle to get it in there at the gate by myself, wrangling a busy toddler and the zipper was definitely screaming.
customer_reviews.author: KPaylor

customer_reviews.title: Good bag quality but poor strap hardware
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this product after the strap hardware broke on the second flight. The bag was loaded with a car seat; total weight was 32 pounds. I picked it up by one strap and the strap came loose after the plastic adjustment clasp broke. No way the carry the seat as a backpack after the strap broke. The fabric of the bag is top notch. Great with the exception of the strap issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it already!
customer_reviews.text: I will follow up after our trip, but so far I am impressed! We have a large Recaro seat that is very difficult to get around and nothing I've tried before (different caddies to roll it) have fit, but it fits so nicely in here without even adjusting the seat back. I am THRILLED! I am actually excited for our upcoming flights now. I'm a single parent and I only fly with my 4 year old so functionality is very important.
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: it worked out great! We did have to adjust the seat to ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this bag with our Chicco Nextfit Zip, convertible car seat. I was really worried that the bag would be too small to accommodate the behemoth convertible car seat we have. But, it worked out great! We did have to adjust the seat to fit in the bag. We checked this bag for two flights from Nebraska to Oregon and it made it there in one piece without dings or defects! So glad we bought this bag!! Carrying it is not as cumbersome as you would think. It looks large, but the waist belt really helps distribute the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Momofluna16

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware - no quality control
customer_reviews.text: My product came used. There is a dirty napkin and some random person’s identifion card with Name -phone number etc. The item itself smells of cleaning products. The box looked sealed. They clearly didn’t check before passing it on to the next customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, plenty of space for seat and more.
customer_reviews.text: We've used this bag a few times now (checked in both various train and airline baggage environments). The bag has held up just fine in its many miles logged. I do notice some separation of the threading at the seams - most likely from rough handling. We patched it up on our own and haven't really had any issues. The stitching is really the only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5. The shoulder straps are very nice and comfortable. We're able to pack the car seat, extra toys, and a few other toddler items in the bag with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mansour

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 Trips
customer_reviews.text: The bag was great for the first 2 trips and fit a large convertible car seat. I wore it as a back pack for most of the haul from long term parking to the air train and the 10 minute walk to checked baggage. Everything went wrong on the third trip, when picking up luggage I went to put on the backpack and the strap broke on one side. It was frustrating and I thought how am I going to get this seat back to my car on the return trip. So here I am shopping for a new one to be delivered to my hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, but works
customer_reviews.text: Overall it works if you want to keep your car seat from getting dirty. It is really bulky and hard to fold, so it does take up a lot of space even when not in use. Carrying it is uncomfortable, I wish I had ordered one that had wheels for a pulling option. We have a Graco 4Ever 4in1 car seat. It fits but is a tight fit. You must make sure the car seat is in the most up right position and lowest headrest level.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Graco Extend 2 Fit Car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Used this car seat protector on two flights for our Graco extend 2 fit car seat and it was perfect!! It was incredibly convenient to be able to wear the car seat on my back until I checked it at the counter. It held up well and it really protected the car seat. I chose the purple color because I wanted it to stand out and I’m so glad I did... no one told me to pick it up in the “Oversized baggage” area of the airport and not where all the other luggage comes out. I was across the airport and saw the purple after starting to panic that they lost it. I highly recommend this car seat protector!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! It’s my second one. I travel A LOT! Around the world. This bag makes it so convenient for getting through airports. Fits the car seat plus extra blankets. Thick fabric. I’ve had it it for more than a year, the first one for more than two years. The zippers are both in great condition. No rips or tears. The straps are still in good condition. I throw this thing around and shove it in the closet when we don’t need it. It has been through 100’s or airports and has survived that abuse. Definitely makes life easier. Especially since I’m not a light traveler. I always have a ton of suit cases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would definitely recommend this item to others
customer_reviews.text: purchased two of these for our trip recently. The bags fit our graco nautilus perfectly and even enough room inside for blankets, and a small travel potty. Under the handle there is even a section where you can write you name and contact information for traveling with airlines. Its a little difficult to get it in and out. One of the straps broke as soon as we put it on our back. we are in the process of exchanging/returning it. would definitely recommend this item to others. side note: depending on the airlines they might call this an oversized piece of luggage. Southwest misplaced one of the carseats when we got to our destination. It appeared after about ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Marin

customer_reviews.title: Durable, padded and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Have used 2 of these on 4 flights. No damage at all to our car seats or the bag itself. The bag is well padded, which is great for protecting the seat and makes it much more comfortable when carried on your back. We wanted one with wheels, which this one doesn’t have, but the backpack straps are placed well and are sturdy and comfortable. We use ours with the Graco extend2fit convertible seats and they fit great. It comes nicely folded, so pay attention to how it collapses and folds because it’s not easy to get it back into the compact folded, flat way that it comes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, nice style just TOO LARGE
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get to use the bag since I returned it. I returned the bag because it was extremely big and felt uncomfortable on my back. Im petite so the bag just weighed me down, if I kept it, I wouldn't of been able to carry anything else not even a purse or the baby because It made me feel weighed down and my husband didn't want to haul it around on his back either. Despite sending it back the quality of the bag was good and strong, I had the blue and gray it looked really cute, just to large for me.
customer_reviews.author: sammy b

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and daughter in law. They both love their Zohzos! The bag did what was needed on their recent flights and protected the car seats. It is easy to transport with the backpack straps. They could have fit other items into the bag with the car seat if they wanted. Very reasonably priced as well. I had a small issue with one of the bags - it was resolved immediately. Really good customer service on top of a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Vmkd2020

customer_reviews.title: Purple Bag
customer_reviews.text: This Car Seat Travel Bag worked great for our trip. It is padded to protect the car seat from being thrown and jostled. My husband was able to carry it on his back throughout the airport which left his hands free to carry/roll other luggage. It was also easy to put the car seat in an take it out with the big zipper front part. We also had room left over to put other things in the bag as carry on items. (ps. my husband said why did you have to choose purple.) We were also stopped in the airport and were asked where we got the bag and what it was called. People seemed to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Might not fit.
customer_reviews.text: BeWARE this won't fit on the Graco car seat. It is identical to the other brand Amazon sold that I also bought which didn't fit. If you have a smaller car seat, just buy whichever cheaper because they're the same. The customer service told me it would. After I bought it and found out it didn't fit, their reply was pretty much it's your own problem now. The material seems good but I don't know how long the zipper will last thou. If you find my review helpful, please vote so. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: SimonAndSally

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a must buy for parents with car seats. It can be a close fit, for instance I had britax boulevard and it fit bit again was close. But really protects the car seat well, great big zippers, nicely padded, bright purple color very visible, place to identify seat. Has backpack straps that make it really easy to carry the seat on your back. Even a somewhat heavy seat like britax boulevard which had been a real pain to carry before in my simple car seat bags which always wear thin soon. One of the smartest purchases you can make for parents traveling with young kids. For 33 bucks definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Fit car seat and other stuff
customer_reviews.text: Made a very busy trip with my 2 month old and this held up through every flight. I gate checked the car seat for most of the flights and it Folded up small enough to fit in the bottom of the stroller when we were going through the airport. It kept the car seat safe and clean and when I traveled from colder to warmer climates I was bales to stuff our bigger jackets in there with room to spare. Plus I liked the purple color, made it easy to spot at the baggage claim
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Painful if your car seat is heavy
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this because it was just too painful to wear. If you have a heavy carseat like we do (nextfit zip) maybe reconsider this and go for one with wheels for about 20 bucks more. This was an absolute back and shoulder killer for both me and my husband. Neither of us held up well with this on our back for any amount of time. If your carseat is lighter I would reccomend this just because it seems to be very well constructed and durable. Which is why I still had to give 3 stars even though it didnt work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Krystan Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to travel with a car seat
customer_reviews.text: An excellent way to check your car seat in a bag. The padding worked great to protect the seat and stood up to airline travel. However due to the padding, it doesn’t fold flat. Not a huge issue for me, but might be a consideration for some. The back pack straps are reasonably padded and not terribly uncomfortable, but I wouldn’t want to carry the car seat for a long time that way, but mostly because the car seat is so heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M. Daoust

customer_reviews.title: Well thought of quality product, cheap too.
customer_reviews.text: We were thinking on this model and a model with wheels. We are glad we picked this one. Wheels are great, but we needed something that we could throw at check in and not have to worry about until we get to our destination. We are already carrying other bags with wheels and would end up with the car seat on our backs anyway. That aside, this is top quality product here. It is super sturdy and well protected. The straps to put it on your back are in a really great position, it balances the thing very good. Really happy to have gone for this product, great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Madrigal Calzado

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make it through one trip
customer_reviews.text: The bag was comfortable and easy to use. The stitching overall on the bag is good and it has a nice sturdy zipper. It fit our Britax car seat nicely. Unfortunately the handle is not that strong... It ripped while I was carrying it through TSA. This would be a solid 5 star bag if that handle could be secured to the bag better.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Bag for Car Seats of All Sizes!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVED THIS PRODUCT! We just traveled with this bag, and it was an absolute dream! I’m a little OCD and loathe the idea of using car seats from rental car companies, so traveling with our car seat is a MUST for us. I wanted a product that was padded because we planned to check it and needed something to be protected against the man handling of checked luggage! This product had the perfect amount of padding for protecting the seat, while maintaining a light weight so it was easy to carry! Plan to purchase another as soon as our next baby comes this Fall! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Kost

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't even make a flight intact
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to using this bag to ease us in our European vacation where we needed to bring a car seat. Traveling with a 3 month infant isn't easy to begin with but as soon as we arrived at our hotel I noticed the handle tearing. Knowing this bag didn't even make the flight intact is troubling. They attempted to reinforce the stitching point but feel the canvas might be low grade. Now I have to remember not to use the handle any longer for the rest of the two week trip. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin K.

customer_reviews.title: Travel must have for parents
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy bag! Normally we bring our car seat onto the flights, but as my two year old is getting more wiggly we opted instead for a FlySafe Harness and checked our car seat instead. This bag carried our Evenflo sensorsafe on an international flight, and I had peace of mind knowing the seat was safely padded. We were even able to fit my six year old’s booster inside the car seat and have them in the bag together. It is a big cumbersome without the seats in it so it will take up space in the hotel room, but that’s no problem. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Barron

customer_reviews.title: Protected the car seat great. Strap clip broke.
customer_reviews.text: We bought/took it for a 3 week multi leg trip. We used it with a diono radian, with the front sitting attachment still attached. It went on 6 flights (4, 2 of which each had a layover). It probably was walked 2-5 miles. The seat was protected perfectly. But when hoisting the whole thing up, to plastic clasp (for adjusting shoulder strap) the belt around my waist, it broke. I ended up just tying the shoulder strap and it got us the rest of the way through the trip.
customer_reviews.author: DWheeler

customer_reviews.title: Must have for travel with a baby
customer_reviews.text: I recently flew alone with my son and without this bag I don’t know how I could have managed my two bags to check, plus the baby in the stroller plus the car seat. I don’t think I could’ve gotten everything from the car to the counter to check everything. Yes it is bulky with the seat in the bag strapped on your back, but it gives you both hands to manage everything else. Highly recommend! Plus the fabric is super durable and good quality and there was even room to sneak a few extra things in the bag with the car seat so my big bag wasn’t overweight. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Perry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel bag for large car seats.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item! My daughter lives in Brazil and was visiting for the summer. We bought a Graco Nautilus 65 3-in-1 car seat for her baby while she was here. It was a large car seat that went from infancy to 50 pounds with lots of padding, etc. This travel bag not only held the car seat but several other items as well. It had straps for her to carry it in hand or as a backpack making it much easier to transport not only the car seat, but several of the baby's other items (like some toys we had also purchased). I would highly recommend this travel bag for anyone doing serious traveling with a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Countingthreads

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for carrying a car seat around through the airport. I could not imagine doing it without the shoulder straps! Gave it 4 stars because its a little uncomfortable with the carseat against your back. This is obvious though, I just wish there was padding of some sort on the backside of the back that lays against your back to make it somewhat comfortable to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable, worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this bag! Just got done from a vacation where the bag had to be checked 4 different times and every time we went to baggage claim I kept waiting for a RIP or tear. It's a wonderful bag! Super sturdy! I just wish they had folding instructions because it comes so beautifully folded and I couldn't remember how to fold it back up once we were done. I think I did my best. Honestly we used trash bags in the past and this was WAY easier. I dont know why we didn't buy this a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Colby Vlietstra

customer_reviews.title: Great when traveling, hard to store
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so that we could check our Chico Keyfit infant carseat for a recent flight out of the country. It definitely did it's job and we were able to use our carseat without issue. I bought this item over others because of the padding, but honestly, I'm not sure how much protection it actually provided. That's ok though. It's durable and there's plenty of space to accommodate all types of carseats and even some room inside of the carseat to stuff extra items in (definitely came in handy on the flight back!). Overall, a good product. The only issue we're having now is storing it for future use since it's pretty big and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: crunchypear

customer_reviews.title: This bag holds up!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these over a year ago for our Britax Frontier car seats and used them with ease on several trips. I am a petite 5ft 2in, and my husband and I each carried one on our backs very easily. Unfortunately our rental car on one trip was broken into, and they stole one of these bags (it was folded up empty in the backseat). I am back to purchase a third now, because I believe in this product and I know that its durable and works. I won’t even look at all of the other covers here on Amazon because this one is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E. Green

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, but good idea
customer_reviews.text: I'm a FTM and I was traveling for the first time this past Christmas and was trying the best to prepare and make things easier. I think this is a great product and it's nice to have the option to wear the car seat instead of lug it around. However I will say it's extremely bulky and my husband felt pretty dorky wearing it around! Not sure if we will necessarily use the product again but it was nice in some ways freeing our hands a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this case for a carseat to travel via flight. We took our first flight last week and checked the carseat at the counter inside the bag. It withstood the two flights pretty well. If you struggle to fit your carseat, you might have to put carseat in complete upright position. We did. Its easy to spot at baggage claim too! My only suggestion would be for longer shoulder straps - my husband has broad shoulders and he found it s bit snug to fit.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for air travel
customer_reviews.text: This bag fit our car seat and base really well. It did not have trouble zipping and was not overloaded. The bag seemed really well made and like it would last. It was really easy to carry on our back and the color stood out (not just black). However, after a round trip (four legs total) and gate checking each time, the bag has a hole in it and our car seat has a tear in the fabric. I would not recommend this bad if you are checking your car seat at all - either gate or ticket counter. The bag needs more padding and support for the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Awbrey

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this bag. It's roomy enough for any car seat. We pack ours without the base, which gives plenty of extra headroom to toss in some blankets or extra items that you can check through for free. It seems very sturdy; we've taken it on multiple flights and hauled it around between hotels without issue. The backpack straps are a huge help lugging this thing through the airport because it is definitely huge. I was only thinking about keeping the car seat protected when I bought, but now I'm really glad I didn't buy one of the drawstring or duffel style bags that would protect a seat fine but be impossible to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Seth K

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this car seat travel bag. I've done a couple of air travel trips with my daughter's car seat and did not have a travel bag. The car seat is cumbersome and pretty much impossible to carry when you are also wrangling a toddler and luggage. The travel bag has comfortable straps, so you can carry the car seat like a backpack. It is worth the money to have your hands free. The convertible car seat slipped right into the bag with no problem for me. I also did not have any problems with zipping up the bag or fraying like others have indicated in their reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Veebee

customer_reviews.title: 1) the top panel you zip open is not padded and 2) my husband says it's uncomfortable to wear it like a backpack
customer_reviews.text: Traveled 3 times thus far with no damage to our car seat so that's a definite win! I took off a star for two reasons: 1) the top panel you zip open is not padded and 2) my husband says it's uncomfortable to wear it like a backpack. Must not be enough padding there. Overall though, we're very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ariane

customer_reviews.title: Protected our brand new convertible car seat
customer_reviews.text: I was super nervous about checking our brand new car seat on our flight without getting damaged. This bag worked really well. It has some padding and a durable zipper. It fit our Graco Extend2Fit convertible car seat perfectly and I also threw in a pack of diapers and wipes to save room in our suitcase. I zip-tied the zipper shut before checking it with the airline to be sure that the zippers did not come open. The back pack straps are nice for carrying it through the airport, but it is very heavy. The bag held up very well for our flights, I don't see and damage at all. Overall, I would definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Really convenient and large but...
customer_reviews.text: We use this bag everytime we fly and it is a lifesaver with a baby and a young child. I didn’t have any problem fitting an infant car seat and a backless booster seat in the bag. The reason why I gave it only 3 stars it’s because one strap broke after only one use. It still worked but it’s eefinitely on its last leg.
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable...love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent travel bag! very sturdy and durable. Made carrying the car seat and traveling with it super easy. I love that it's padded so it doesn't hurt my shoulders carrying it around for long hours (yes, I did take an Uber one time and had to carry the car seat for a few hours). This is my second travel bag; the first one I purchased was alright, but wasn't as padded (kind of like a big bag with tiny straps). This one is great and worth every penny. Will be updating my review if anything changes, but so far I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Nermin El-Galy

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has made several trips and is still in perfect condition. I first used it with my Chicco Keyfit 30 car seat (just tilt the seat part at an angle) and it fits perfectly. Now that our son is bigger, we just bought the Gracco 4ever all-in-one and the bag fits it like a glove. I love that it has padding at the top to help protect car seat. I'd say the only thing it's lacking is a set of wheels--those would be super handy. But I still highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rhesa B.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best thing for traveling. It was easy to put my daughter’s Brit a car seat in the bag and the book bag like feel made it easy to walk through the airport with. The extra strap made it so there wasn’t much weight on my back and it kept the car seat clean from all the bangs and scuffs that usually come with flying.
customer_reviews.author: michelle f

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for a mother traveling alone with an infant. It is easy to pack the car seat in and carry to luggage check. I found it incredibly useful when my suitcase was over weight and I had to transfer clothes to the car seat bag as there was a lot of extra space. Definitely worth buying but also know that it won’t stay pretty. The fabric got pretty beat up from it being tossed around in cargo. However, it was durable and here were not rips or holes. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The purple is not as vibrant as the picture, but still bright. I have the Britax Marathon and it’s a tight fit. You have to have the head rest all the way down for it to fit on the top. Not easy to carry on your back as the base cuts into your back (just carried to attic and it hurt). I’d only use this for storage for now as if I’m traveling, I’d want to bring the car seat on plane. Maybe I’ll change mind Later when I don’t need it for plane
customer_reviews.author: Regina A. Ciampi

customer_reviews.title: Broke during our departing flight
customer_reviews.text: We first thought this bag was pretty high quality because it survived 2 round trips, but during our 3rd trip using this bag, which was to Hawaii, it broke and we didn’t have a car seat bag to bring back home (since Hawaii isn’t in the contiguous US, Amazon Prime options weren’t going to work since we were only there for 5 days). It was pretty sad because we had to throw it away when we got to the airport. We then made the decision to just borrow car seat from rental car companies and just pay the extra fees from now on.
customer_reviews.author: cahreviewlete

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter as we were planning our first family trip. It was able to hold a Graco Aire3 infant seat with the base attached to it. No tears on the back of anything broken after one round trip. It seems fairly durable. We checked it as baggage so that’s the ultimate test.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Suzuki

customer_reviews.title: Large & Durable Carseat Bag
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bag to fly with our Britax Advocate Clicktight cardeat and it fits great. It feels nice and durable. We checked the car seat with no problems and the bag held up well. My only complaint is that it is pretty bulky to carry the car seat as a backpack when also dragging other luggage and the thing that could make this bag even better would be if it also had small wheels just for moving it easier. I would highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with less expensive price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this travel bag because the other brand was sold out. Turns out my decision seems correct. The bag itself can be fold well whitout extra accessories when not using it. It keeps back strip out, so you can still carry it on ones back. Size is big enough for my Graco infant car seat 35LX,and I almost able to squeeze in another Cosco scenera Next car seat if there is one more inch deep (which will be great for 2 baby+toldder family traveling without extra hands.) Texture and zipper seems quite durable. Next month I will know if that is true after crucial long teen flight cargo transportation.
customer_reviews.author: AC LEE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pria70
customer_reviews.text: This car seat case was very durable and perfectly fit around our maxi cosi pria 70 car seat. We just traveled from California to Kauai and it kept our car seat safe. After all that traveling, the case still looks great. My husband said that it makes the car seat feel like a small back pack and was very comfortable to wear. I would recommend this to friends depending on the car seat they have. All I can speak for is the pria 70 and it fit like a glove with some room to spare (we packed two sleeves of diapers in the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nastassja McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great investment in keeping your beloved car seat clean
customer_reviews.text: I have just started travels. Small flight from SD to SF. Worked great. Fully padded except for zippered flap. Easy to put in. I have a Peg Perego Convertible car seat. I adjusted it to an upright position which made it easier to do by myself. No tears kept my seat clean. No one else had a cover and they were envious of mine. Going on an international flight soon so I will update if needed but so far a great purchase to keep me safe and to let me have my car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'2" and can easily lift the seat and strap it to my back ...
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a slightly cheaper bag to carry our carseat through airport luggage check, but it was not truly protective of the seat and was unpleasant to carry. I wasn't expecting anything to make carrying the seat pleasant, but this bag does it somehow! I am 5'2" and can easily lift the seat and strap it to my back if my husband and I are traveling separately. Plus, it's very well padded so the seat hasn't been scuffed up in the least.
customer_reviews.author: AMLWalker

customer_reviews.title: Protects well and easy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Maxi Cosi Pria85 Max like a glove. I was also able to put a cloth bin inside full of toys on top of the car seat to save space in our suitcase. It kept everything secure and protected. We checked our car seat and the cover was very sturdy and undamaged! The backpack straps and waist belt made moving the car seat so easy (and I’m only 5’2)! Love it and will use it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for travelling moms
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have 2 graco 4ever carseats for my 2 toddlers and when I travelled in the past something ALWAYS got broken! When I use the zohzo bag they didn't manage to break anything! Those car seats are NOT cheap, so these bags are more than worth it. The back pack straps are a great bonus. They also fold up nice and small when I'm not travelling so they aren't a pain to store. The colors are fun, the quality is great, and I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie H

customer_reviews.title: best we have seen!
customer_reviews.text: Chose this one over the JL Childress option for the following reasons: had the hard button protectors on the bottom (vs just fabric on JLC), had a self-contained storage holdup solution (vs a totally separate velcro piece that would almost certainly get lost on the JLC), and had more structure/better zipper situation overall. Haven't traveled with it yet, and will update review if any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3rd use, but was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing! Made carrying our car seat super easy, and didn’t hurt my back! Sadly, after our 3rd use, one of the straps is breaking off. I’m so disappointed because it worked so well, when it worked. (And I didn’t overload it. Just used it to carry our Chico nextfit, so no adidtional weight was in the bag)
customer_reviews.author: Pg

customer_reviews.title: Car Seat DAMAGED!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't protect car seat like to was suppose to. I have an expensive top of the line car seat and it had a big dent on it and made the carry arm crooked and my husband had to use all his force to fix it. I don't know if it was damaged by it being tossed around during the flight or by employees but either way this bag didn't do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy carrying case, Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Used for our trip to Europe. Worked like a charm. Was able to pack away our car seat without any issues. Definitely large enough for our car seat (Graco). Wearing it as a back pack is a little precurious given the bulky nature, however it was not too strenuous on the back. The straps held well, so did the handle, with no issues. The belt wroks well to stabilize while you wear it. All in all, very happy we purchased this and would consider doing again if we need to. Highly recommend if in the market for one!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Calix

customer_reviews.title: Great Product..
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Flew round trip from the East Coast to California and no issues. Held up really well and was checked with all of the regular baggage. I only have an infant car seat so not sure how it will hold up with a larger convertible car seat. It is very large and funny looking when worn as a backpack but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: N Ruck

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the Christmas plane travel with my one year old by myself. This made things a little easier by keeping my hands free to push the stroller with one hand while pulling a large suitcase with a diaper bag on top of it with the other. I even put her three car toys in it. This fit the base, car carrier, flappy the elephant and two cabbage patch safari kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Durable, but really big.  maybe design one with wheels?
customer_reviews.text: Really durable. we purchased a different bag and it tore along the seams on the first trip. This bag is noticeably stronger and has padding on the inside as well. It did great on our cross country trip. The downside, this thing is a beast to lug around. The clips for the waist strap broke somewhere in transit. Our Britax has the base attached which hits right in the small of your back. I think a luggage cart would have been more realistic for a 30lb car seat.
customer_reviews.author: art

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Next time I'll just check in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I traveled with this and let me tell you about my experience. I thought I could bring it on the plane but it was too big BUT my airline(United) checked it in to my destination as priority and it made safely. No damage to my car seat and it kind of insulated it as well. It's so roomy, I decided to put some stuffed animals and diapers for the trip back home. Love it. Next time I'll just check in my car seat to my destination
customer_reviews.author: Carmin B

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this carseat cover and it performed quite well for my Graco 4Ever 4-in-1 convertible car seat. The car seat fit well and snugly after collapsing it and the material was padded well. It held up great on our domestic flights. I had purchased a carseat cover by Munchkin and was very disappointed as that one had ripped in just one flight, and even though they had sent me a replacement, the same thing happened again. I was very pleased by the quality of the Zohzo cover and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dania Khan

customer_reviews.title: Fits Nuna Rava Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Just took this on our first big trip with our Nuna Rava convertible car seat. Fit perfectly, even when I didn’t have time to fold in the foot rest. The backpack style was so helpful for my husband while pulling the luggage as well. We got the bright purple which was great when collecting luggage. No damage to car seat and such a great value for the price! Great buy, very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time traveling with a car seat, and I’m very glad this bag was recommended to us for the trip. It’s a durable bag that makes lugging a big car seat around a far less difficult task, and honestly it felt like a pretty good workout for my back, too. It took some getting used to as we trekked across the airport, but watching another dad struggle to carry his seat and standard luggage, I was very relieved to have this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Burnsy

customer_reviews.title: Great Airline Carseat Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that easily fit our Safety 1st Grow and Go convertible car seat. Checked it (for free) at the airline service desk with all our other luggage. Arrived undamaged at each destination. The backpack straps made carrying a bulky and combersome item in and out of the airport a breeze. My nephew was a great car seat caddy!! :-P If you travel a lot - or even just a little - this bag is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for my Britax Marathon car seat. The back had light padding which was great. I’d probably put in a towel as the base of the car seat sits right on the small of my back. It was fine for baggage check, but it would’ve been uncomfortable to wear all the way to the gate. It comes with a tag holder for your info.
customer_reviews.author: Gorsuch Gal

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: A must have for traveling, seriously love this and that i can shove his little (for short trips) in with the carseat! Great material, very durable and the backpack straps are clutch. Makes traveling as a single parent so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: h. minkler

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this car seat travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this car seat travel bag! We purchased this product for our first cross country move with two carseats. We purchase our original car seat travel bag through Babies R Us and purchased this one for our second seat. I prefer this back to our other. It's held up extremely well, is padded, high quality and the back pack straps made our lives much easier when we were already struggling to managed to kids, two strollers, suitcases and pack n plays. I fully intend to purchase another to replace our other car seat cover! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a life saver for solo traveling with baby! I’ll put this on my back, put my diaper backpack on my luggage, babywear the baby, and off I go! The actual bag is extremely well designed. It’s padded so I truly feel my car seat is protected as much as possible. It was a pretty tight fit for my Graco clickconnect and base but after some adjusting I got it to all fit. All in all I’ve already recommended this to friends. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: Travel essential for travelers with young kids
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. Bought two for a toddler seat and a larger booster seat and both fit great with room to spare. Has backpack straps which makes it easier to carry, still heavy but worked for us. Wish we'd bought thee sooner instead of renting car seats during previous travels.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana K.

customer_reviews.title: Poo quality
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I decided to purchase this travel bag. Upon receiving it: 1) actual item box was bent and torn in the corner, 2) material and zipper are cheap, 3) it didn't have enough padding as I would like, especially the front flap was not padded, 4) the backpack straps were very uncomfortable, and 5) the car seat and base (as stated by reviewers would fit) did NOT fit. With just the car seat alone in the bag, it made the bag floppy and awkward to carry, and it sunk down as the bottom of the bag is not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: So far so good carseat bag!
customer_reviews.text: It’s big! It really is huge lol but it worked🙌🏽! It lasted for our round trip flight to Florida. It was so roomy! It fit our Chicco Keyfit 30, the base and seat AND some extra diapers, wipes, and a few of her toys! Husband carried it on his back, it was big and awkward, but it was fine to carry from the car to check in and baggage claim to car.(which yes, we checked it, and took baby in stroller which we just gate checked)
customer_reviews.author: Ludesi24

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat bag and much prefer it over ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat bag and much prefer it over the JL Childress version (which we also have). This bag has a nice strap around the waist to help better balance the heavy weight of car seats and appears to have slightly more padding then the JL Childress version. I also appreciate that this bag looks slightly different so is easy to identify on the baggage carousels. So far, it's holding up really well and we couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Anna L.

customer_reviews.title: Held up great
customer_reviews.text: This is big, and looks crazy on your back, but it protects the seat well and has held up well so far (2 flights being gate checked). It did not fit through the x-ray machine, though, and had to be hand inspected in both airports (which means taken out of the bag, so don't cram too much stuff in there with the seat).
customer_reviews.author: KetchupSpudTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Fit our Britax!!
customer_reviews.text: Have not used these yet but so far we are impressed!! Other bags specified our car seats would not fit, took a chance with this bag and both fit!! We have the Britax Parkway SGL and the Britax Frontier 85 SICT. Bag seems very durable with heavy duty fabric and zipper. Im a little concerned the the zipper will pop with the Frontier, it is a very tight fit, will update after our flight in a couple weeks. **Update** Worked wonderfully!! Easiest way to carry a car seat, just be careful when turning around people, this is very bulky. Held up through two flights with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ian D.

customer_reviews.title: Total lifesaver for a single mom!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to carry my son’s car seat into the airport. I had 2 carry-on bags, a checked bag, a stroller, my son, and his car seat to wrangle. I couldn’t have managed it without this bag. I strapped it on my back and corralled the rest of it the check-in counter with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie M.

customer_reviews.title: Best travel option!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous! I bought 2 one for our Chicco NextFit and one for our KeyFit w/ base. Both fit in perfectly and were so easy to carry. Held up wonderfully throughout flights and fit great in the store-n-go in the van. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Walters

customer_reviews.title: Fits Evenflow evolve
customer_reviews.text: This bag feels real nice and constructed well. I haven't used it yet but it fits my Evenflow evolve platinum which is a booster front facing seat that's quite large for a large baby. It has a nice name tag window and card and the color is real nice. Straps seem sturdy and have good padding. It folds nicely and buckles up to be real compact for stowage. Overall I would buy this again. I will try to update it once I use this.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan T.

customer_reviews.title: Fits chicco 360 with base, 3 round trips so far
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been on 3 round trips so far, no tears or rips, highly recommend. This was my second car seat bag that I’ve tried, I had the smaller orange bag that folded into itself initially and it ripped after my 2 trip. This bag doesn’t fold up small but does protect your car seat. I also recommend the stroller bag too. Initially I didn’t have a bag for that and an airline lost the canopy to my chicco visor stroller which was $75 to replace!!
customer_reviews.author: renchic

customer_reviews.title: Must have for traveling with a carseat!
customer_reviews.text: Our infant car seat and now toddler seat fit in this very easily (not together). Great protection for while in the cargo hold and the backpack straps make getting from the car to check-in very easy. There is just enough space in the bag to wedge in diapers or dirty cloths to take some weight out of the other bags.
customer_reviews.author: Astro21

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Totally durable and love that is rolls up with a clip so you can attach it to the stroller. It was a little large for our graco infant car seat but still a perfect fit. Padded inside protects carseat please the of room for toodler car seat. Easy to close zipper with back carrying straps. Made it out ok I'm one trip ATL to FL
customer_reviews.author: sakeena morgan

customer_reviews.title: the good this is that you can recognize easily at pickup ...
customer_reviews.text: was concerned how to carry such a big car seat! but this takes care of the issue designed and perfected for travelers and you can squeeze in a few more things inside of it as well! the good this is that you can recognize easily at pickup from the airport.. they allow you to load it onboard at no extra cost! the bag is pretty much a HUGE PACKPACK that can be used in the future for other purposes when travelling!!!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I had no clue how I was going to fly with my child's car seat. But this thing does the job. It holds my child's Graco Snugride 35 carseat AND base with room to spare to throw in some toys. You can throw it on your back like a backpack, but the carseat is pretty awkward feeling. But that's to be expected. The most important thing is that it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Vila

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Went on two flights, one short and one longer one. Held up well for both and has no signs of wear/tear apart from dirt marks. The shoulder straps were perfect and helped a lot while I traveled with two young ones by myself. I used it for a full-size booster with the back attached.
customer_reviews.author: roxyzgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for Checking Carseats
customer_reviews.text: We have a small enough child that we were able to travel with her in our lap, but we still needed to take a carseat. This bag was perfect! We checked the bag with our normal luggage. I'm very pleased with how it held up being checked! We have a Chicco KeyFit 30, and it fit the base and carseat with plenty of room. We were even able to stick our travel crib in with it. I also love the backpack style, so it was one less thing we had to drag. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag but with a huge handle flaw
customer_reviews.text: We used this travel bag to go from California to Hawaii. Upon our return flight the top handle gave out. It was simply not designed to hold the full weight of a car seat (Britax Boulevard). I had to shlep the seat using the shoulder straps as my handle making it difficult to move the seat from the car to the fruit check and then to the counter. Wish I could get my money back...
customer_reviews.author: Z Unger

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the job
customer_reviews.text: Just took it on its first trip. Did its job well. The straps are comfortable enough-carries like a hiking backpack. The only thing I would suggest is some way to secure the waist strap when not in use(maybe just a pocket to stick the buckle in and clip so its covered). As is now it just hangs there and the clip got all scratched up as its dragged along the cargo hold. Will be updating as trips come as to how durable it proves to be
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rose

customer_reviews.title: Protect you car seat
customer_reviews.text: Car seats are expensive. Some cost as much as a piece of furniture, keep them nice and protected from the abuse of airline travel. You can carry as a back pack when you need hands free for other items or carry from the top Handle. I even strapped the the small toddler soft travel bag into the seat before checking it with airline worked like a charm one less thing to carry.
customer_reviews.author: lisa pollifrone

customer_reviews.title: First trip with it
customer_reviews.text: As far as what it holds and the ease of carrying it, it’s great. We’re heading to the car and I noticed this tear. So I am not impressed as we have another trip in a few months. I will not risk using it again, and diapers & such falling out. Would have been better off with the $10 version.
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for traveling by air. I traveled alone with my 6 month old and this worked perfectly for carrying (Gracco) car seat, base, and stroller seat adapter for car seat. I was even able to toss items from my luggage to balance the weight of my suitcase. ( I was 4 pounds over the limit, ha) I checked this free of charge with American Airlines. Worked perfect, every thing arrived in great shape. great purchase and will use again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to transport my kids car seats on our recent flight. One car seat is a chicco nextdoor and the other is a graco 4 ever. Both fit great in the travel bag and I took advice from others and stuffed some extra diapers in the bag. I will definitely use these again the next time we travel with the kids. With the backpack feature on each bag it allowed my husband and I to get through the airport with 2 kids, a double stroller, 2 rolling bags, 2 book bags and 2 car seats without anything extra!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The Good: It fits the Grace Forever quite nicely. The Bad: no padding for your back. The car seat’s awkward form will dig into your back from a weird angle. Note to Self: Why did I decide to fly with a 1.5 year old with the largest car seat ever?
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Backpack for Car Seat Travel
customer_reviews.text: This car seat backpack is great! It is plenty big for car seats of all sizes. Currently I am using it for a Chicco infant carrier with base. The gray and blue design is fun and helps you easily identify your bag among the rest. I love that it is a backpack because my hands are free for carrying everything else associated with infant travel! This is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: LWB

customer_reviews.title: Great protective car seat bag!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! We used it going to and from Hawaii and the car seat was perfectly protected and had no issues! We even stuffed it full of extra items that were too heavy for our luggage! I loaned it out to a family member traveling to Europe and it was PERFECT! came back in great condition too. It’s really held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super usful
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our Chicco KeyFit 30 with its base. The fit was not perfect, but we got it to work for two 6 hours flights. Love the color which helped us quickly identify our car seat
customer_reviews.author: Lily Kwong

customer_reviews.title: Not made well.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like this bag. It has great protection and seems to be made well but after our first trip (3 flights total) I noticed that one of the seams completely ripped open. I don't trust it to hold up. Such a bummer as it was super handy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

product_meta.title: ZOHZO Car Seat Travel Bag — Adjustable, Padded Backpack for Car Seats — Car Seat Travel Tote — Save Money, Make Traveling Easier — Compatible with Most Name Brand Car Seats (Black with Black Trim)
feature_bullets: ★ TRAVEL MADE EASY: Traveling can be difficult when you have a young child still in a car seat. Our versatile backpack allows you to take their seat everywhere you go so you never have to worry about their vehicle safety.
★ ULTRA COMPATIBILITY: Our premium, adjustable backpack not only saves you money on flights, it also fits most car seats manufactured by major brands

★ HEAVY DUTY, WATERPROOF DESIGN: We’ve carefully crafted our traveler’s backpack using heavy-duty, water-resistant fabric and a lockable double zipper opening. This ensures it can stand up to the rigors of a busy airport terminal.

★ COMFORTABLE, HANDS-FREE CARRYING: The ZOHZO Car Seat Backpack can be carried by use of the built-in handle, or by the shoulder and waist straps for hands-free comfort. Keep your hands free to play with children and hand over your tickets.

★ SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Each of our car seat backpacks come with a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty. What’s more, if you aren’t completely happy with our premium backpack, simply return it within 14 days for a full refund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,402 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
